title: #PriceHikeMonday : Bottled Water prices increased
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Water Bottle Manufacturers Associations aid that the price of bottled water has been increased due to the shortage of raw materials, fuel price hike, and the shortage of empty bottles.
Accordingly, the price of a 1 1/2L water bottle has risen to Rs.120/- and a 5L water bottle is now Rs.300/-.
